name: test_oauth[chromium]
description:
arrange: integrate the penpot charm with an oauth provider.
    act: login penpot using openid connect.
    assert: login success.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: integrate the penpot charm with an oauth provider.
act: login penpot using openid connect.
assert: login success.
